creator: Ashley Figueira
descriptionHtml:
※ The #1 App for UFC and MMA.

All MMA provides you with everything you need to know about the world of men and women’s MMA including fights, results, videos, news, rankings and much, much more!

Main Features of All MMA include:

✔ Get minute by minute updates during live fights including fight commentary, results and stats.
✔ Home screen displaying the latest news, upcoming event, latest videos, featured players, latest galleries and more.
✔ Watch all the major fight highlights, pre and post-fight interviews and personalised content for the UFC fans.
✔ Always get notified about the latest fights, news, videos and galleries.
✔ Have a closer glimpse at our own gallery section and look deep into the action of the fight.
✔ Set event reminders for any upcoming events within the app.
✔ Lookup the results for ALL UFC fights and fight stats.
✔ Buy tickets for upcoming events all within the app.
✔ Lookup all you need to know about your favourite fighter including his record and all time stats.
✔ Keep up to date with the latest UFC rankings.
✔ Make your fight prediction and check what others are predicting for main events.
✔ Look at the latest UFC social media posts without leaving the app.
✔ Fancy some Joe Rogan MMA podcasts? We have that too!

We will be adding new features to the app and will notify you when they become available in the App Store .

This application is not an official one and is not created by or endorsed by or otherwise related to UFC. It is created and supported by MMA fans for other supporters of the sport.

We are open for cooperation. You can contact us with any questions or suggestions at our email: ashleyfigueira@gmail.com.
descriptionShort: UFC Events, Results, Rankings, Videos, News, Galleries and more ...

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- Minor fixes and improvements. Fixes crash on Android 7.X

We constantly update our App to add new features and fix bugs.
Please keep updating it to get the best experience!

title: All MMA - UFC Latest News & Live Fights

creator: Ashley Figueira
descriptionHtml:
※ The #1 App for UFC and MMA.

All MMA provides you with everything you need to know about the world of men and women’s MMA including fights, results, videos, news, rankings and much, much more!

Main Features of All MMA include:

✔ Get minute by minute updates during live fights including fight commentary, results and stats.
✔ Home screen displaying the latest news, upcoming event, latest videos, featured players, latest galleries and more.
✔ Watch all the major fight highlights, pre and post-fight interviews and personalised content for the UFC fans.
✔ Always get notified about the latest fights, news, videos and galleries.
✔ Have a closer glimpse at our own gallery section and look deep into the action of the fight.
✔ Set event reminders for any upcoming events within the app.
✔ Lookup the results for ALL UFC fights and fight stats.
✔ Buy tickets for upcoming events all within the app.
✔ Lookup all you need to know about your favourite fighter including his record and all time stats.
✔ Keep up to date with the latest UFC rankings.
✔ Do you think you can guess who is going to win? Make your fight prediction and check what others are predicting.
✔ Do you think the fight was boring? Rate the fight and see what other thought about the fight.
✔ Looking for some old school stats? We have a whole archive that goes back to 1993 so that you see how Royce Gracie became a legend in the sport.
✔ Look at the latest UFC social media posts without leaving the app.
✔ Fancy some Joe Rogan MMA podcasts? We have that too!

We will be adding new features to the app and will notify you when they become available in the App Store .

This application is not an official one and is not created by or endorsed by or otherwise related to UFC. It is created and supported by MMA fans for other supporters of the sport.

We are open for cooperation. You can contact us with any questions or suggestions at our email: ashleyfigueira@gmail.com.
descriptionShort: UFC Events, Results, Rankings, Videos, News, Galleries and more ...

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- Now the archive is split by years so it's easier to go back in time and check out how Royce Gracie became one of the most influential guys on MMA.

We constantly update our App to add new features and fix bugs.
Please keep updating it to get the best experience!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- We've heard your suggestions and you can now search for a fighter.
- You can now select your favourite fighter so you can get all the latest news/videos and results.
-We've changed the theme a little bit to a more dark theme.

We constantly update our App to add new features and fix bugs.
Please keep updating it to get the best experience!

descriptionShort: UFC Events, Results, Rankings, Videos, News, Galleries and more ...

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
This release comes with some big news.
- You can now cast videos directly to your TV.
- You will now see news and articles from other other organisations. The same goes for Galleries.
- You can now view videos from Bellator and One Championship.

We constantly update our App to add new features and fix bugs. Please keep updating it to get the best experience possible.

title: All MMA - UFC Latest News & Live Fights

creator: Ashley Figueira
descriptionHtml:
※ The #1 App for MMA.

All MMA provides you with everything you need to know about the world of men and women’s MMA including fights, results, videos, news, rankings and much, much more! Organisations include UFC, Bellator and One Championship. Have all the information from all the major organisations at the palm of your hand.

Main Features of All MMA include:

✔ Get minute by minute updates during live fights including fight commentary, results and stats.
✔ Home screen displaying the latest news, upcoming event, latest videos, featured players, latest galleries and more.
✔ Watch all the major fight highlights, pre and post-fight interviews and personalised content for the MMA fans.
✔ Always get notified about the latest fights, news, videos and galleries.
✔ Have a closer glimpse at our own gallery section and look deep into the action of the fight.
✔ Set event reminders for any upcoming events within the app.
✔ Lookup the results for ALL fights and fight stats.
✔ Buy tickets for upcoming events all within the app.
✔ Lookup all you need to know about your favourite fighter including his record and all time stats.
✔ Keep up to date with the latest ESPN rankings.
✔ Do you think you can guess who is going to win? Make your fight prediction and check what others are predicting.
✔ Do you think the fight was boring? Rate the fight and see what other thought about the fight.
✔ Looking for some old school stats? We have a whole archive that goes back to 1993 so that you see how Royce Gracie became a legend in the sport.
✔ Look at the latest social media posts without leaving the app.
✔ Fancy some Joe Rogan MMA podcasts? We have that too!

We will be adding new features to the app and will notify you when they become available in the App Store .

This application is not an official one and is not created by or endorsed by or otherwise related to UFC, One Championship or Bellator. It is created and supported by MMA fans for other supporters of the sport.

We are open for cooperation. You can contact us with any questions or suggestions at our email: ashleyfigueira@gmail.com.
descriptionShort: UFC, One & Bellator Results, Rankings, Videos, News, Galleries and more...

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: With this update you can now see upcoming, complete or live events of other organisations such as Bellator and One. Head over to the events screen and click on the filter option or head over to the settings screen and choose your prefered organisation.

✔ Lookup all you need to know about your favourite fighter including his record and all time stats.
✔ Keep up to date with the latest ESPN rankings.
✔ Do you think you can guess who is going to win? Make your fight prediction and check what others are predicting.
✔ Do you think the fight was boring? Rate the fight and see what other thought about the fight.
✔ Looking for some old school stats? We have a whole archive that goes back to 1993 so that you see how Royce Gracie became a legend in the sport.
✔ Look at the latest social media posts without leaving the app.
✔ Fancy some Joe Rogan MMA podcasts? We have that too!

We will be adding new features to the app and will notify you when they become available in the App Store .

This application is not an official one and is not created by or endorsed by or otherwise related to UFC, One Championship or Bellator. It is created and supported by MMA fans for other supporters of the sport.

We are open for cooperation. You can contact us with any questions or suggestions at our email: ashleyfigueira@gmail.com.
